document_data.name: Salvanas di Riyos
document_data.mainbody:
'''Salvanas di Riyos''' was an [[elf|elven]] sailor who could be found philandering in the [[Copper Coronet]] of [[Athkatla]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Prepare..? Really? You... um... want to get a room here? Well, I... I...I think I hear my captain calling! Yes, my captain! COMING, CAPTAIN! ''|Salvanas di Riyos fleeing after his advances were reciprocated}}
document_data.Description: Salvanas was a pale-skinned elf who wore green-colored clothing.
document_data.Personality: Salvanas accosted attractive women who frequented the tavern with flattery and attempts at seduction, however, in reality, his behavior hid insecurity and fear of actual intimacy.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Salvanas di Riyos frequented the Copper Coronet in Athkatla's [[Athkatla/River District|River District]] slums. During that time he have had at least one encounter showing unwanted attention to the aspiring [[halfling]] [[paladin]] [[Mazzy Fentan]], referring to her as his "little [[chestnut]]." Another frequent visitor of the Coronet, [[Nalia de'Arnise]], was well aware of Salvanas and eagerly turned him down, not letting him shower her with unwanted attention.
